Text:
Game works great. Biggest shitgame I've played in a while though. I think I'm going to stick with NFS Nitro. The controls are bad, the colors could be brighter and the graphics are blurry.

4/10 Biggest disappointment of the year.
This is not the same game as shown on tV commercials, especially for the Wii, the one on TV is for Playstation 3

@tronsolo The difference between the wii version and the ps3 version is huge. I've got both and I must say that NFS Hot Pursuit on the PS is the best NFS since the beginning. This version was just handed to another company with the words: "Make something from it and put our name on the box, it will sell anyway."

I'm new to wii games so, what should i do? 
just burn the image file or do i have to crack 
somithing or whatever? ^^

r1ntse: I don't now if it will work that easy (but i hope so, for your sake).
Otherwise i recommend buying a usb-hdd and softmodding it :)
